org.hyperdata.swing.container
Class DocumentPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JScrollPane
                  org.hyperdata.swing.container.DocumentPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible, ScrollPaneConstants
public class DocumentPane
extends JScrollPane
implements KeyListener

Wraps up a JEditorPane with scrolling and utility I/O methods.

See Also:
Serialized Form

loadFile

public void loadFile(String filename)
Load a file into the editor pane. Note that the setPage method of JEditorPane checks the URL of the currently loaded page against the URL of the new page to laod. If the two URLs are the same, then the page is not reloaded.
